title: @surf_to_vol_spackle
description: Project data from a surface dataset into a volume primarily using 3dSurf2Vol but then filling any holes with an iterative smoothing procedure.

maskset.title: Mask Set
maskset.description: Mask dataset in which to project surface measures.

spec.title: Surface Spec
spec.description: Surface specification file with list of surfaces.

surfA.title: Surface A
surfA.description: Name of the first surface, e.g., smoothwm, pial, etc.

surfB.title: Surface B
surfB.description: Name of the second surface. If not included, computes using normal vector.

prefix.title: Prefix
prefix.description: Basename of output. Final name used is prefix.nii.gz.

normal_vector_length.title: Normal Vector Length
normal_vector_length.description: Normal vector length if only using a single surface (default 2 mm).

search_radius.title: Search Radius
search_radius.description: Radius for search for mean to fill holes (default 2 mm).

num_steps.title: Number of Steps
num_steps.description: Number of steps on line segments (default 10).

keep_temp_files.title: Keep Temporary Files Flag
keep_temp_files.description: Do not remove any of the temporary files (default is to remove them).

max_iters.title: Max Iterations
max_iters.description: Maximum number of smoothing and filling iterations (default is 4).

use_mode.title: Use Mode Flag
use_mode.description: Use mode instead of non-zero median (appropriate for ROIs).

datum_type.title: Datum Type
datum_type.description: Set datum type to byte, short, or float instead of maskset type. Mode triggers -datum short.

ignore_unknown_options.title: Ignore Unknown Options Flag
ignore_unknown_options.description: Ignore additional options that are not needed.
